channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.description:

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: DAMAGE INSPECTION; LEAKER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED UNDECLARED HAZMAT AND CONTACTED HAZMAT HELP DESK.

item.title: Report X-2023081202
item.description:
Report X-2023081202

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet, damaged package was unloaded from trailer and immediately removed from workflow. Package was left in front of QA cage for inspection. Package was placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: Bottle caps are loose, leaked during transport. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of corrosive liquid.

item.title: Report X-2023081174
item.description:
Report X-2023081174

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking pkg was found during loading. Pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023081115
item.description:
Report X-2023081115

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-14T15:12:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-11
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Liquid leaked from the contents wetting the side panels and top closures during sortation. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps and failed inner seals allowed liquid to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report E-2023090170
item.description:
Report E-2023090170

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-10
  • City: MERIDEN
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one case of oven cleaner (na1760) had been damaged by a sharp object and that one of the inner poly 1 gallon bottle had released 1 cup of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023080928
item.description:
Report X-2023080928

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was found to wet on the bottom corners. Upon discovery the pkg was placed in an unauthorized unlined plastic bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps and failed inner seals on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in plastic bin.
